import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useCart } from '../context/CartContext'; const Cart = () => { const { items, updateQuantity, removeFromCart, getTotalPrice } = useCart(); if (items.length === 0) { return (

Your Cart is Empty

Add some products to get started

Continue Shopping
); } return (

Shopping Cart

{/* Cart Items - Mobile Responsive */}
{items.map((item) => (

{item.name}

{item.category}

${item.price.toLocaleString()}

{/* Quantity Controls - Mobile Responsive */}
{item.quantity}
{/* Delete Button - Mobile Responsive */}
))}
{/* Order Summary - Mobile Responsive */}

Order Summary

{items.map((item) => (
{item.name} x {item.quantity} ${(item.price * item.quantity).toLocaleString()}
))}
Total ${getTotalPrice().toLocaleString()}
Proceed to Checkout
); }; export default Cart;
